function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Uncertainty in the association between transmission rates and npi, weather, and voc","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on parameter values from the scientific literature","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Population-based approach does not account for age structure of the population, impacting the spread of disease","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Model does not deterministically account for travel between regions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High attack rates and seroprevalence in the population","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of no waning immunity leading to higher estimates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Estimation of high average national basic reproductive number r0","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of match between hospital data and npis at the regional level","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Variability in the impact of partial bar closure across regions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Constantly changing policies between private and public measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stable compliance with a package of ’barrier gestures’ compared to individual components","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in modeling the impact of school closure","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Identification problem due to curfew timing","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding regarding the impact of weather conditions on transmission rates","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Confusion bias between weather conditions and variant of concern voc","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential overfitting of complex models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the hospitalization period dh and its impact on disease spread in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Complex mathematical modeling approach may lead to errors in estimating the effective reproductive ratio r_eff","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission rate estimation may be inaccurate","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Model comparison may lead to incorrect conclusions","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of outdated or invalid models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Negative association between closure of bars and restaurants and transmission rates","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for weather variable in the initial model","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large aic for model 4 compared to other models","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Hospital-acquired covid-19 due to airborne transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of other microbial bioaerosols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air changes in ’surge’ wards and intensive care units icu .","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited data on the effectiveness of engineering solutions for improving ventilation and air sterilization.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Low awareness of the importance of ventilation and air sterilization in reducing the spread of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential exposure to sars-cov-2 and microbial bioaerosols in a covid-19 ’surge’ ward.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pathogen detection and analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Statistical analyses","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to detect sars-cov-2 rna on control sampler","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High levels of viral, bacterial, and fungal pathogens detected in the air samples from the surge ward","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in the air samples from the surge icu","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne circulation of sars-cov-2 in hospital environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of agreed standard for sampling and detection of airborne viruses","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Aerosol generating procedures increasing respiratory aerosols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in the air of a ward managing patients with covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of a range of bacteria, yeasts, and other respiratory viruses in the air of hospital rooms.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the impact of air filtration on nosocomial infections.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of evidence for sars-cov-2 removal by portable air filtration devices","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Uncertain optimal air changes required to remove detectable pathogens","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential artefactual reduction in the viability of sampled virus by air sampling devices","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on healthcare professional and patient-focused outcomes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Portable air filtration devices as a mitigation strategy for reduced availability of airborne infection isolation facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restriction of access to public green spaces due to covid-19 social distancing measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited assessment of the impact of domestic gardens on wellbeing during lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of assessment of the contribution of urban green space to wellbeing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited studies on the impact of domestic gardens on psychosocial factors and physical health during lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
